text: @realDonaldTrump As with your 15,000+ depraved lies in the past 3 years, while covid-19 advanced upon us like wildfire with a strong wind behind it, you spent much of Jan. & Feb. with your psychotic hate-speech rallies, playing golf and boasting about yourself & shelved a 69-page pandemic report.
